channel.title: I need help with an npc
channel.description: I want to know how to place an npc for my server I will add a pic (from another thread) My server is not Hippescape my servers name is Mupescape v1 and I want wise old man old man on my server to say "Welcome to Mupescape v1!!" (without quotes even though most of you people already know that) I want it to start off around my training spot which is xcoord: 3191 ycoord: 3431 (facing south) on one side and xcoord:3199 ycoord:3431 (facing south) on the other. I want both of them to stay still without movement. I will appreciate some help from you people and even though probably most of you people don't even know what I am talking about...IDK how to explain it and clearer please ignore the useless poll no need to vote.

item.title: I need help with an npc
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I know this is wrong spot to ask another question but,Does anyone have the download link for ricscape v2 (Iknow you people will same I am leeching I don’t care…thats why I am trying to change it) My pc got cleaned out soz I lost the download link site for my server and I lost paper that I wrote it on.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2007, 01:35:34 PM[/size][hr]Sorry to double post this thread is really old but what do I do with “Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption”???

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with an npc

item.title: I need help with an npc
item.dc:creator: @p0unding p0unding
item.description:
@p0unding wrote:

To place an npc follow below:

-Go to autospawn.cfg after you have got the ID number for the npc you want
-You will see the coords copied and pasted 3 times.
-It will say the npc ID and change that after you copied and pasted another npc.
-Find the case where the npc talk in npchandler.java and changewhat it says
(add the ID above)
A bit obvious. And most people probs knows what ur talking about. You already
posted half of what you wanted with the choords in the speech above? So I dont know
why you posted that.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with an npc

@Mupescape wrote:

I want to know how to place an npc for my server I will add a pic (from another thread) My server is not Hippescape my servers name is Mupescape v1 and I want wise old man old man on my server to say “Welcome to Mupescape v1!!” (without quotes even though most of you people already know that)
I want it to start off around my training spot which is xcoord: 3191 ycoord: 3431 (facing south) on one side and xcoord:3199 ycoord:3431 (facing south) on the other. I want both of them to stay still without movement. I will appreciate some help from you people and even though probably most of you people don’t even know what I am talking about…IDK how to explain it and clearer please ignore the useless poll no need to vote.
